page.title: 15Steeple Claydon - Games
page.content: {Sample: children aged 8-10 years It was found that when children play together at home with friends or siblings they often continue games that are played at school.Many games depend on the weather: {Wet weather games:}Computer games such as Greedy Gremlins or Backpackers.playing with Lego,dolls or Star Wars figures. Reading, Colouring,Writing, Mummies & Daddies, Dungeons & Dragons,Dressing up,Acting, Card and Board Games. {Dry Weather games:}Riding bikes, Climbing trees,Making camps,Runaways, Fishing,Snowballs,Sledging,Disco Dancing,Rounders,Tennis,Going to Clubs,Swimming,Conkers,French Skipping,Football,Hide & Seek,Roller, Skating.
